1. How do you know the Policy Owner and the Life Insured OR What is your relationship to them?
new customer self referral from bank referral from existing
2. Please describe the job of the Policy Owner and Life Insured in detail, such as duties, workplace and working conditions (including
full-time job and part-time/extra work) only if significantly different from what has been disclosed in the application form.
3. Based on your estimation, what is the annual income of the Policy Owner and the sources of this income of the Policy Owner:
Any other sources of Income: Fuyuctdty
4. Please tick the appropriate check boxes below, if there is any visible physical or mental disability, impairment, incapacity OR any
other detail which is significantly different from the information disclosed by Life Insured that would be / may be material for Dai-ichi Life
Insurance Myanmar Ltd. to be aware of to underwrite and accept the application. If none, please tick None.
Smoking Habit Additional information (if any) None
I declare that I have personally validated the identity of the Policy Owner and the Life Insured with the NRC/passport provided, and that
they have personally signed on this Application. I also have no further information to supplement the information provided by the Policy
Owner and the Life Insured with regards to the acceptance of this Application Dai-ichi Life Insurance Myanmar Ltd..
If the Agent is a Policy Owner and/or the Life Insured, please provide the signature of his/her Supervisor below.
